Html:
Seeking the stream position in IWavePlayer and it's inheritors when playing
is wished.

The reason why we don't have this is because a lot of IWaveProvider implementors are not inherently repositionable, and making it support reposition requires a cascade effect of repositioning all the way down the audio pipeline. It is easier to simply reposition at either the mixer stage, or at the file reader stage for playing a single file.
